Attacks.Name: Tackle
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Swift
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cannot be blocked by cover.

Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Charm
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, reduce the target character's attack dice by 2 for their next attack this round.

Superpowers.Name: Run Away
Superpowers.Effect: When Eevee is targeted by an attack, before attack dice are rolled, you may use this superpower. Eevee immediately makes a short move. If this move takes Eevee out of range of the attack, the attack misses.

Attacks.Name: Last Resort
Attacks.Effect: This attack can only be used if Eevee has used all of its other attacks at least once this game.
